name: Android for ARMv6
body:
### Welcome to AndroidArmv6 pages.

Project links:

* [Bug tracking](https://code.google.com/p/androidarmv6/)
* [Gerrit (review)](http://review.androidarmv6.org/)
* [Jenkins (continuous integration server)](http://jenkins.androidarmv6.org/)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/androidarmv6)


### Building android from source code

```
$ mkdir WORKING_DIR
$ cd WORKING_DIR
$ repo init -u git://github.com/androidarmv6/android.git -b cm-10.1
$ repo sync
$ sh vendor/cm/get-prebuilts
$ source build/envsetup.sh
$ lunch
$ adb push out/target/product/DEVICENAME/cm-VERSION-DEVICENAME.zip /mnt/sdcard/
```


### Contact

androidarmv6group@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
